channel.title: TrisidiaX 317 Source And Client Release!
channel.description:
[center] [size=12pt]Well this is my First Release for TrisidiaX! or my First release for any Source and Client in that matter, so let me know how i do![/size]
[size=24pt] Now Lets get to my 317 Source and Client TrisidiaX![/size]
[size=15pt]Wondering how to fix the 99 glitch on RsWeblcients? here is my tut on how to do that!:[/size] [size=14pt]Click here to find the Fix for 99 glitch RSW -Trisidia:[/size] [size=14pt]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555016.0.htm[/size]
[size=12pt][In Progress][/size] SOF [Squeal Of Fortune] Server Announcements For everything [Loot, Mute, Ban etc..] Patching All Dupes! [90% Patched] Adding in Price Checker Duel Arena Glitches [Not being able to attack while in duel, etc..]
[size=12pt][Things I Have Completed!][/size] Added In Working MoneyPouch! Fixed the dupe in the MoneyPouch Disabled Dropping [Can be Undisabled if you like, code will be bellow] Added In Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed the Dupe with CheatEgine Fixed the Drop Save Dupe [90%] Added in custom items Added in [Server] Announcement when you get 99 [100% Working] Added in custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Added in Lottery, [Lottie] Added in Zombie Minigame [I DO NOT TAKE CREDIT FOR THIS!] Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Added 120 Dungeoneering Fixed The Arrow Dupe Glitch Added Player Titles Added Auto-Server Save Added UIDs Added in dice command for Donator+ [size=14pt] AND SO MUCH MORE![/size]
[size=16pt] Now Please Enjoy These Pictures![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/2nd%20Picture.png[/img]
[size=12pt]MoneyPouch Dupe Patched![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/MoneyDupe%20Patched.png[/img]
[size=12pt]My Custom SOF With its own command![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/Picture%203.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Changed The Slayer Shop Completely MAKEOVER![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/4th%20picture.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Added 120 Dungeoneering![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/5th%20picture.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Added a Donor Point Shop![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/Pictutre%206.png[/img]
[size=12pt]To show you donor point shop has its own point system![/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/Pictures/Picture%207.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [size=18pt]Credits:[/size] [size=10pt]InsidiaX- 10% ME/Trisidia- 50% Ajmcbsat- 40%[/size]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [size=24pt]If you use this source Please Give me some Credit![/size] [size=14pt]Click here for TrisidiaX V1 Source, Client and Cache Downalod: [size=14pt]http://uppit.com/pt8y8jxrkkno/TrisidiaX_Source_And_Client.zip
[size=18pt] The things i have changed on the new download -Added Auto server Save -Fixed the Starter Ip Glitch -Added in autodownload working cache download just run the client n it should start the download by it self.[/size]
[size=20pt]Download Goals![Blue = Completed, Red = Not][/size] [size=12pt]250 Downloads.[/size] [size=12pt]500Downloads.[/size] [size=12pt]750Downloads.[/size] [size=12pt]1000Downloads.[/size] [size=12pt]1500Downloads.[/size] [size=12pt]2000Downloads.[/size] [size=12pt]3000Downloads.[/size] [/center]

item.title: TrisidiaX 317 Source And Client Release!
item.dc:creator: @flinchy3 flinchy3
item.description:
@flinchy3 wrote:

first thing… i saw the pics n thought “wow this looks awesome” but i went to start the game up n it made me want to stop looking for a private server … i want to play a good private server so if i can get help ill play it if not then its just a lil time in my life lost and ill delete it.

i go to start it up and i get this message …

TrisidiaX is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4\Maps\mapConfig.
txt (The system cannot find the file specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115)
at client.startUp(client.java:9183)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6185)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Loaded 525 graphics…
Loaded Compressed Models…
Loading animations
Loaded the flo.
602 NPC Amount: 11257

what am i doing wrong , what am i missing, or can someone use teamviewer on a day i dont work to help me out?..

im new to the whole private server thing n im trying alot of different ones to see what i like best …

if someone has all this stuff and can simply send it all to me through teamviewer (no setup needed) then that works too.

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX 317 Source And Client Release!
item.dc:creator: @dustin122711 dustin122711
item.description:
@dustin122711 wrote:

[quote=“TrisidiaX, post:182, topic:449537”][quote author=nardoscape link=topic=552436.msg4172756#msg4172756 date=1354575266]

TrisidiaX I need help the server works fine but the client won’t work I specified my path and all that configured the client.java and compile.bat but I keep getting this error here is a paste of the error… (I’m still new to RS coding so I really need help)

Fixed it!

[code]TrisidiaX is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4\Maps\mapConfig.
txt (The system cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115)
at client.startUp(client.java:9183)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6185)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/80555744/TrisidiaX_Cache
_Webclient_V1.3.zip
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)

    at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou

rce)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno
wn Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So
urce)
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unkn
own Source)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109)
at Update.(Update.java:27)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4816)
at client.startUp(client.java:9193)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6185)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/80555744/Tris
idiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.3.zip
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So
urce)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So
urce)
at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getContentLength(Un
known Source)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104)
… 6 more
error[/code]

Whats the fix for this?
[/quote]
Ok, you need to add a cache, when you have your cache uploaded, replace the link with mine in client.java and cachedownloader.java in client.java look for cache.zip on the left side you will see a link, replace with yours and it will fix the error.[/quote]

Replace with what link? Please help ! I can run the source, but when i run the client i get that message, how to fix this please help !

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX 317 Source And Client Release!
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[quote=“nardoscape, post:181, topic:449537”][quote author=bob2766 link=topic=552436.msg4123752#msg4123752 date=1350127354]
TrisidiaX I need help the server works fine but the client won’t work I specified my path and all that configured the client.java and compile.bat but I keep getting this error here is a paste of the error… (I’m still new to RS coding so I really need help)

Fixed it!

[code]TrisidiaX is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4\Maps\mapConfig.
txt (The system cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)

at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115)
at client.startUp(client.java:9183)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6185)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/80555744/TrisidiaX_Cache
_Webclient_V1.3.zip
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)

    at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou

rce)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno
wn Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So
urce)
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unkn
own Source)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109)
at Update.(Update.java:27)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4816)
at client.startUp(client.java:9193)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6185)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/80555744/Tris
idiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.3.zip
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So
urce)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So
urce)
at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getContentLength(Un
known Source)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104)
… 6 more
error[/code]
[/quote]

Whats the fix for this?[/quote]
Ok, you need to add a cache, when you have your cache uploaded, replace the link with mine in client.java and cachedownloader.java in client.java look for cache.zip on the left side you will see a link, replace with yours and it will fix the error.

Read full topic
